item.title: About
item.description: My name is Nicolae Paladi, I am a researcher at Lund University and the CEO & Co-founder of CanaryBit AB.

item.title: Standict 2021 06 15
item.description: On Tuesday June 15th I will be speaking for the ELITE-S Programme about my IETF standarization experience supported by the StandICT EU project. The idea of this presentation is to inspire the fellows of the ELITE-S programme to get involved into standarization activities.
